text: War (originally called Eric Burdon and War) is an American funk/rock/soul band from Long Beach, California, known for several hit songs (including "Spill the Wine", "The World Is a Ghetto", "The Cisco Kid", "Why Can't We Be Friends?", "Low Rider", and "Summer"). ==References== Category:1969 establishments in California Category:Musical groups from Long Beach, California Category:American soul musicians Category:American funk musicians Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1969 Category:1960s American music groups Category:1970s American music groups Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups
title: War (American band)
